abstract: The European justice commissioner plans to propose tougher rules on breaches of privacy, setting standards that could be followed in the United States.
snippet: The European justice commissioner plans to propose tougher rules on breaches of privacy, setting standards that could be followed in the United States.
lead_paragraph: BRUSSELS — As pressure grows for technology companies like Apple and Google to adjust how their phones and devices gather data, Europe seems to be where the new rules are being determined.

headline.main: Europe Leads in Pushing for Privacy of User Data
headline.print_headline: Europe Leads In Pushing For Privacy Of User Data
